blocks.content:
## **My Availability**

At the moment, I'm contracting at Co-op, working on [Co-op Insurance](https://www.coop.co.uk/insurance/). My current contract runs until **May 2021** so I won't be looking for a new role until April at the earliest.

### Recent Projects

 I began contracting at Co-op in February 2020 and in that time have helped to replatform their [Co-op Legal Services](https://www.co-oplegalservices.co.uk/) and [Bereavement Advice Centre](https://www.bereavementadvice.org/) websites. Prior to that, I was contracting at Booking.com and helped to launch their [car rental site](https://www.booking.com/cars/).

hero.headline: Hi, my name is John
hero.textline: I'm a senior front-end developer based in Manchester.
